wikipedia_page.main: Walter Baldry Tammas (23 August 1870 – 12 January 1952) was a British tug of war competitor who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics.In 1908 he won the bronze medal as member of the British team Metropolitan Police "K" Division. Four years later he won the silver medal as member of the joint City of London Police-Metropolitan Police "K" Division British team.
